EmailTemplate.name: Acess Request Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Approval request for Accessing SOE
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!ApprovalRequest.Process_Approver}, This mail is regarding approval request of {!Access_Request__c.00N28000004eQY1} to complete assigned TASK, brief details as follows: SOE : '{!Access_Request__c.SOE__c}' TASK: '{!Access_Request__c.Task__c}' Description:' {!Access_Request__c.Request_Description__c}' Please click here to review the request
Regards, {!Access_Request__c.OwnerFullName}
